songs.title: Genie 2.0
songs.album: Keeps Gettin’ Better: A Decade of Hits
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I feel like I've been locked up tight
A century of lonely nights
Waiting, waiting for someone
You're licking your lips
And blowing kisses my way
That don't mean I'm gonna give it away
Baby, oh, baby

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me
Baby, there's a price you pay
I'm a genie in a bottle
You gotta rub me the right way

[Verse 2]
The music's playing and the lights down low
Just one more dance and then we're good to go
Waiting, waiting for someone
My hormones racing at the speed of light
But that don't mean it's gotta be tonight
Baby, ooh, baby

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me
Baby, there's a price you pay
I'm a genie in a bottle
You gotta rub me the right way

[Verse 3]
If you wanna be with me
I can make your wish come true
Gotta make a big impression
Gotta like what you do
Gotta like what you do
Gotta like what you do
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby

[Bridge]
Come on, come on and let me out
Come on, come on and let me out
Come on, come on and let me out
Come on, come on and let me out

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me
Baby, there's a price you pay
I'm a genie in a bottle
You gotta rub me the right way

[Verse 4]
If you wanna be with me
I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression
Gotta like what you do
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby

[Outro]
Come on, come on and let me out
Come on, come on and let me out
(My heart is saying' no)
Come on, come on and let me out
(My heart is saying' no)
Come on, come on and let me out
(My heart is saying' no)
Come on, come on and let me out
(My body's sayin' let's go)
Come on, come on and let me out
